snippet.title: Ikusa Megami Memoria - Bandit Haregga Boss Battle
snippet.description:
Got a couple of gameovers until I figured out a strategy. Units were quite underlevelled, so I was fortunate to be able to beat him.

The main idea is to whittle down his TP bar through repeated defending and healing using Kaula and the support fairy. 

TP (Technical Points?) is the resource used to cast physical-based skill attacks, and the skills he casts deal quite a bit of damage, not to mention the chance of a Poison ailment being inflicted as well.

After exhausting his TP, all you have to do is to just regularly attack him until he runs out of healing potions and you are done. Kaula apparently has some sort of skill that increases her DEF(?) when at low HP, so Haregga is unable to one-shot her at these thresholds (Excluding his skill usage), thus after exhausting his TP, Kaula should be invincible.
